author: multiple people
details:
This tool install both TCPgecko and Cafiine into system memory so that you can use them at the same time.

Special thanks to : Maschell / Dimok / NWPlayer123 / amibu / seresaa / MachMatic and brienj.

OatmealDome says , Shoutouts t oeveryone at the splatoon Modding hub Discord because i probably annoyed them by talking endlessly about the various problems i encountered.
title: Geckiine
